content: the artfully simple infinity scarf pattern is super easy hides a multitude of sins and comes with just one rule no stress allowed this finished scarf is between 50 and 60 inches long and twists and turns on itself naturally perfect for wearing doubled as a cowl as well as long tied anything you can come up with the little button tie embellishment is a separate optional piece and instructions for that are included as well this pattern is available for free on my blog or you can purchase the easy to print pdf here on ravelry the artfully simple infinity scarf pattern is super easy hides a multitude of sins and comes with just one rule no stress allowed this finished scarf is between 50 and 60 inches long and twists and turns on itself naturally perfect for wearing doubled as a cowl as well as long tied anything you can come up with the little button tie embellishment is a separate optional piece and instructions for that are included as well
